alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 3:09PM CST until March 02 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN GRAYSON COUNTY... At 309 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitesboro, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Whitesboro, Denison, Pottsboro, Randell Lake, Eisenhower State Park, Lake Texoma, Preston, Sadler, Dixie, Locust, Gordonville, Sandusky and Sherwood Shores. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central Texas. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
